page.title: 20PONTSTICILL SURVEY CREDITS
page.content: The children of Standard 4 Cyfarthfa Junior School,Merthyr Tydfil who carried out the Domesday Survey of the Pontsticill area would like to thank the following peole for their help and support now that the project is complete: Mrs.Thomas of Pengelli Fach Farm Mrs Davies of Penrhadw House Mrs James of The Rectory Mr.Bevan of the Water Board Mr Hills of The Brecon Mountain Railway Mr Price of Brecon Library Mr H.G.Jones,Headmaster of Cyfarthfa Junior School And particular thanks to Nerys Evans, Lisa Lewis,Clare Davies and Michael Probert of Standard 4 who gave up the first week of their holidays to complete the project.Mrs G.Foley B.Ed. teacher in charge of the project.
